item.title: Create Candy Cane Lettering in Procreate
item.description: Here’s a written overview of how to candy cane lettering in Procreate : Set your background color and write out your typography with the pencil pro brush at 25%. Fill up a large amount of the canvas with your lettering since it will be the focus. Create your candies by creating a new layer and […]
